name: DATH
description: Slasher platformer with RPG elements. You have to fight for the creatures of darkness against the kingdom.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8/10 Processor: 1.5 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8/10 Processor: Dual core processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 100 MB available space
